synonyms.synonym: Guanine nucleotide-binding protein G(y) subunit alpha

protein.specific_function: Guanine nucleotide-binding proteins (G proteins) are involved as modulators or transducers in various transmembrane signaling systems. Acts as an activator of phospholipase C

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Jiang M, Pandey S, Tran VT, Fong HK: Guanine nucleotide-binding regulatory proteins in retinal pigment epithelial cells. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1991 May 1;88(9):3907-11.
